doc:
Alec Clunes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alec_Clunes 0 Alexander Sheriff de Moro "Alec" Clunes (17 May 1912 – 13 March 1970) was an English actor and theatrical manager.Among the plays he presented were Christopher Fry's The Lady's Not For Burning. He gave the actor and dramatist Peter Ustinov his first break with his production The House of Regrets. His film career was brief, but varied. He played Hastings in Laurence Olivier's Richard III (1955), and also appeared in wartime films such as One of Our Aircraft Is Missing (1942), although he was in fact a conscientious objector. He also appeared in The Adventures of Quentin Durward (1955).Clunes' later stage work included succeeding Rex Harrison as Henry Higgins in the stage musical My Fair Lady in 1959. His final stage appearance was in 1968. Alexander_Sheriff de Moro_"_Alec_"_Clunes ( 17_May_1912 – 13_March_1970 ) was an_English_actor and theatrical_manager.Among the_plays he presented were Christopher_Fry 's_The_Lady_'s Not_For Burning . He gave the_actor_and_dramatist_Peter_Ustinov his_first_break with his_production The_House of Regrets . His_film_career was brief , but varied . He played Hastings in Laurence_Olivier 's_Richard_III_(_1955_) , and also appeared in wartime_films such_as One of Our_Aircraft Is_Missing (_1942_) , although he was in fact a_conscientious_objector . He also appeared in The_Adventures of Quentin_Durward_(_1955_) . Clunes '_later_stage_work included_succeeding Rex_Harrison as Henry_Higgins in the_stage_musical My_Fair_Lady in 1959 . His_final_stage_appearance was in 1968 .
